beer.beer_description:
The brewery has been attacked by a literal truckload of hops!

We put our good sense aside and shovelled in absurd amounts of Azacca, Idaho 7 and Mosaic, resulting in a Ginormous and Guicy Californian IPA.

With this kind of hop combo, it doesn’t get much better. Weighing in at a respectable 7.5%, we’re calling it a “Very Big IPA”.

user.bio: Hi I love to use untappd I find it a great way to find beer, venues and friends. What ever the style, I'll try it.
Work less, play more, drink better beer
Proud member of the Extra Special Brewers (ESB) Brew Club - Sydney (Aus)

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 365 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 74!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 45 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 350 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 71! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Aroma of a sweet vanilla ice cream (possibly from the lactose). A tropical coconut flavour with a straw broom whiplash and a hit of dank Mosaic. You may try to figure it out with a glass, however, to be sure, try another.

items.comment: Craig B. It took me quite a few glasses to get the taste right.
